types.style: changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
types.refactor: a code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
types.test: adding missing tests or correcting existing ones
types.perf: a code change that improves performance
types.ci: changes to your CI configuration files and scripts
types.temp: temporary commit that won't be included in your CHANGELOG
types.chore: changes to the build process or auxiliary tools and libraries such as documentation generation

scopeDescriptions: Optional, can be anything specifying the place of the commit change.
For example $location, $browser, $compile, $rootScope, ngHref, ngClick, ngView, etc.
In App Development, scope can be a page, a module or a component.
subjectDescriptions: A very short description of the change in one line.
